thread.section_title: Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Avoid at all cost.
thread.title_full: Avoid at all cost. - Review of Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: davidcb2017
title: Avoid at all cost.
text: No room temperature control. Room was 82 degrees. Fan rattled and did nothing. They know it's a mess and do nothing to fix it. When they decide it's cool enough outside, the central air is turned off and you have NO heat or A/C in any room. Old, dirty, dusty common areas that smell like a steamy locker room. Overpriced SELF-parking. Awful. Completely awful.
